name: prout
description: Tells you when your pull-requests are live. Tells you when they're not, and should be.

APPLICATION_SECRET.description: Random text to use as a crypto seed for signing session cookies. See https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.4.x/ApplicationSecret

PROUT_GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Allows Prout to assume the identity of a GitHub App.  See https://docs.github.com/en/apps/creating-github-apps/authenticating-with-a-github-app/managing-private-keys-for-github-apps#generating-private-keys

PROUT_GITHUB_APP_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret credentials for GitHub OAuth V2. Gives access to diagnostic views.
